price: 34. Waxaanu ku soo dejin dadka magaaladan cadaab kaga iman samada caasintooda darteed.
arabic: إِنَّا مُنزِلُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā munzilūna ʿalā ahli hādhihi al-qaryati rij'zan mina al-samāi bimā kānū yafsuqūna
